items.sentence: I\'d like to help Tom, but I don\'t know how.
I shouldn\'t have tried doing that by myself.
Where did all that self-confidence come from?
I have an older brother and a younger sister.
I look forward to seeing you again very soon.
I\'m surprised Tom didn\'t notice Mary leave.
I\'m surprised Tom doesn\'t know how to swim.
I\'m the one who\'s going to have to do that.
I\'ve decided to let Tom go to Mary\'s party.
I\'ve done everything you\'ve asked me to do.
I\'ll speak to you at a more convenient time.
Let\'s find out what time the concert begins.
Let\'s have a drink and listen to some music.
Tom collects Batman and Superman comic books.
Tom complimented Mary on how nice she looked.
Tom could hear Mary talking in the next room.
My mother died on the same day I got married.
Tom sold the guitar that his father gave him.
Tom somehow managed to swim across the river.
Tom speaks French well, though not perfectly.
